title: Raven Voice
description: Shado is an unusual raven: he speaks like a human and communicates telepathically with his brethren and the human he bonds with. Here's the short story of his life, as told to his human companion, Ronne Donovan. 6245 Words. Also included is the first two chapters from Ravenwyng Chronicles Volume 1: The Beginning. 3224 Words Also included is the first two chapters from Ravenwyng Chronicles Volume 1: The Beginning. 3224 Words
author: Anna Dobritt
